examples.text: the polished, faceted gemstones are beautifully crafted and highly noticeable

definitions: having or involving many different aspects or features

examples.text: the world of opera is highly faceted

shortDefinitions: having or involving many different aspects or features

definitions: (of a search engine, browser, etc.) allowing the use of multiple filters that specify different aspects and qualities of the type of thing being searched for

examples.text: this enables applications to use the referenced data sources to offer faceted browsing instead of simple full-text search

shortDefinitions: (of search engine) allowing use of multiple filters that specify different aspects of thing being searched for
